doc.title: Die wilden Felder und der Krieger
doc.plot: One day a warrior finds his way through the mountains, across a river to end up in exotic, wild fields. He is immediately fascinated by their wildness. When the wild fields bestows some magic seeds to the warrior, tired of all the fights and wars, he decides to investigate into what kind of secret the seeds hold, by working the land. The work is hard and interminable and nature is raw and capricious. It is a big test for the impatient warrior who usually is used to success. But he faces up to the challenge full of excitement.
